```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
```

## Importing data in 

```{r}
green_taxi_full_data <- read_csv("./data/green_tripdata_2019-02.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()

yellow_taxi_full_data <- read_csv("./data/yellow_tripdata_2019-02.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()

for_hire_vehicle_data <- read_csv("./data/fhvhv_tripdata_2019-02.csv", col_names = FALSE) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
```

## Adding header for for_hire_vehicle

```{r}
for_hire_vehicle_data %>% 
  rename(
    hvfhs_license_num = x1,
    dispatching_base_num = x2,
    pickup_datetime = x3,
    dropOff_datetime = x4,
    pickup_location_id = x5,
    dropoff_location_id = x6,
    sr_flag = x7
  )
```
